special_abilities.name: Source.
descriptions: tales from the yawning portal,  page 246

special_abilities.name: Doomvault Devotion.
descriptions: Within the Doomvault, the warrior has advantage on saving throws against being charmed or frightened .

special_abilities.name: Pack Tactics.
descriptions: The warrior has advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the warrior's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally isn't incapacitated.

actions.name: Multiattack.
descriptions: The warrior makes two melee attacks.

actions.name: Longsword.
descriptions: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 7 (1d8 + 3) slashing damage, or 8 (1dlO + 3) slashing damage if used with two hands.

actions.name: Javelin.
descriptions: Melee or Ranged Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 30/120 ft., one target. Hit: 6 (1d6 + 3) piercing damage.
